name: ROOMMATES(?)
description:
Two dumb high school students who barely know each other are stuck in a storage closet for the night. The awkwardness is tangible.

Guess there's nothin' to do but talk.

---

ROOMMATES(?) is my first ever visual novel. It's very short and fairly bare-bones, but I hope it's not too bad!

There are three possible endings.

*Please play in windowed mode because the sprites are gross in full-screen, thank you*

Credits:

  • Art by... ME
    • One (1) background by... ME
    • Three (3) CGS by... ME
  • Two (2) idiot characters created by... ME
  • One lame original story by... ME

Made as my high school Senior Project to Further My Self™ and try new things. It was fun and I learned a lot!

This was also my first attempt at writing. Yeah... I usually just... draw...

If you want to see more of my art, you can catch me on Tumblr, Twitter, and Instagram @Godbear999!
